name: binance-asyncapi-python-template
description: A modular template that generates lightweight Python WebSocket clients for Binance AsyncAPI v3 specifications with asyncio and Pydantic support.

scripts.generate: ${ASYNCAPI_CLI:-asyncapi} generate fromTemplate ${SPEC_FILE:-../../../../specs/binance/asyncapi/spot.yaml} ./ --output ${OUTPUT_DIR:-./output} --force-write -p moduleName=binance-websocket-client -p packageName=spot -p version=0.1.0 -p author=openxapi
scripts.generate:module: MODULE=${MODULE:-spot} && MODULE_NAME=$(node -pe "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('../../../../generator-configs/binance/asyncapi/python/' + process.env.MODULE + '.json', 'utf8')).generator.parameters.moduleName.default") && PACKAGE_NAME=$(node -pe "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('../../../../generator-configs/binance/asyncapi/python/' + process.env.MODULE + '.json', 'utf8')).generator.parameters.packageName.default") && VERSION=$(node -pe "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('../../../../generator-configs/binance/asyncapi/python/' + process.env.MODULE + '.json', 'utf8')).generator.parameters.version.default") && AUTHOR=$(node -pe "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('../../../../generator-configs/binance/asyncapi/python/' + process.env.MODULE + '.json', 'utf8')).generator.parameters.author.default") && ${ASYNCAPI_CLI:-asyncapi} generate fromTemplate ${SPEC_FILE:-../../../../specs/binance/asyncapi/$MODULE.yaml} ./ --output ${OUTPUT_DIR:-./output} --force-write -p moduleName="$MODULE_NAME" -p packageName="$PACKAGE_NAME" -p version="$VERSION" -p author="$AUTHOR"
scripts.test: npm run test:clean && npm run test:generate && npm run test:build
scripts.test:generate: ${ASYNCAPI_CLI:-asyncapi} generate fromTemplate ../../../../specs/binance/asyncapi/spot.yaml ./ --output test/project --force-write -p moduleName=binance-websocket-client -p packageName=spot -p version=0.1.0 -p author=openxapi
scripts.test:build: cd test/project && python3 -m py_compile *.py && echo '✅ Python files compiled successfully'
scripts.test:module: MODULE=${MODULE:-spot} npm run test:module:generate && npm run test:build
scripts.test:module:generate: MODULE=${MODULE:-spot} && MODULE_NAME=$(node -pe "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('../../../../generator-configs/binance/asyncapi/python/' + process.env.MODULE + '.json', 'utf8')).generator.parameters.moduleName.default") && PACKAGE_NAME=$(node -pe "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('../../../../generator-configs/binance/asyncapi/python/' + process.env.MODULE + '.json', 'utf8')).generator.parameters.packageName.default") && VERSION=$(node -pe "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('../../../../generator-configs/binance/asyncapi/python/' + process.env.MODULE + '.json', 'utf8')).generator.parameters.version.default") && AUTHOR=$(node -pe "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('../../../../generator-configs/binance/asyncapi/python/' + process.env.MODULE + '.json', 'utf8')).generator.parameters.author.default") && ${ASYNCAPI_CLI:-asyncapi} generate fromTemplate ../../../../specs/binance/asyncapi/$MODULE.yaml ./ --output test/project --force-write -p moduleName="$MODULE_NAME" -p packageName="$PACKAGE_NAME" -p version="$VERSION" -p author="$AUTHOR"
scripts.example: npm run test:generate && cd test/project && python client.py
scripts.example:module: MODULE=${MODULE:-spot} npm run test:module && cd test/project && python client.py
scripts.test:dependencies: python -c 'import asyncio, websockets, pydantic, cryptography; print("✅ All dependencies available")'
scripts.test:all-modules: MODULE=spot npm run test:module && MODULE=umfutures npm run test:module && MODULE=cmfutures npm run test:module

moduleName.description: The Python module name for the generated client.

packageName.description: The Python package name for the generated client.

version.description: The version of the generated client package.

author.description: The author of the generated client package.
